metadata.Title: CVE-2023-31085 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - low
metadata.Description: An issue was discovered in drivers/mtd/ubi/cdev.c in the Linux kernel 6.2.There is a divide-by-zero error in do_div(sz,mtd->erasesize), usedindirectly by ctrl_cdev_ioctl, when mtd->erasesize is 0.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
